application-form-type.legend: How are you applying for your low THC cannabis license?

continue-an-application.label: Continue an application
continue-an-application.hint: An incomplete application stays on the system for 5 days and is then deleted

licensee-type.legend: What type of low THC cannabis licensee are you?

existing-licensee-renew-or-change-site.label: Existing licensee renewing or changing a currently licensed site

existing-licensee-applying-for-new-site.label: Existing licensee applying for a new site

company-number.label: Company number (optional)
company-number.hint: Enter the  number issued by Companies House

site-responsible-DBS-check.label: I confirm this person has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

responsible-person-dbs-fullname.label: Full name
responsible-person-dbs-fullname.hint: Enter the name as it appears on their DBS application

responsible-officer-dbs-subscription.legend: Has the responsible person subscribed to DBS updates?

witness-destruction-plant.legend: Do you require somebody within your company to be authorised to witness the destruction of the plant?
witness-destruction-plant.hint: This includes the controlled parts of the plant (leaves and flowers)

how-leaves-flowers-destroyed.label: How will the leaves and flowers be destroyed?
how-leaves-flowers-destroyed.hint: Providing a detailed description will help us process your application faster

why-new-licence.legend: Why are you requesting a new licence?

moving-site-date.hint: Enter the date you plan to move sites

is-contractual-agreement.legend: Is the new site part of a contractual agreement?

authorise-witness-DBS-check.label: I confirm this person has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

authorised-witness-dbs-full-name.label: Full name
authorised-witness-dbs-full-name.hint: Enter the name as it appears on their DBS application

authorised-witness-dbs-subscription.legend: Has the authorised witness subscribed to DBS updates?

legal-business-proceedings.legend: Has anyone in your organisation ever been subject to legal business proceedings?
legal-business-proceedings.hint: This includes members of the board and senior management teams. Legal proceedings includes administrative, financial or bankruptcy cases

legal-business-proceedings-details.label: Provide details of the legal business proceedings

has-anyone-received-criminal-conviction.legend: Has anyone in your organisation ever received a criminal conviction?
has-anyone-received-criminal-conviction.hint: This includes members of the board and senior management teams. Conviction means UK and overseas convictions.

is-company-ref-changed.legend: Has your Companies House reference number changed since your last application?

is-change-witness-only.legend: Are you requesting a change in authorised witness for this site only?

is-company-name-changed.legend: Has your registered name at Companies House changed since your last application?

is-change-of-activity.legend: Are you requesting a change of activity?

hold-other-regulatory-licences.legend: Do you hold any Home Office or other regulatory licenses?
hold-other-regulatory-licences.hint: This includes animal scientific procedures and firearms

is-licence-refused.legend: Has your organisation ever been refused a licence?
is-licence-refused.hint: This means licences issued by central or local government bodies and authorities, including the police

refusal-reason.label: Details of why you were refused a licence
refusal-reason.hint: Enter details of what the licence was, the issuing body and the reason for the refusal

contract-start-date.hint: Enter the date you plan to move sites

contract-details.label: Tell us more about the contract and how it affects your licence application

company-type.legend: What type of company is your organisation?

describe-business-model.label: Describe your business model
describe-business-model.hint: If applicable, include your company type as registered with Companies House

cultivate-industrial-hemp.legend: Is the licence needed to cultivate and possess low THC cannabis (industrial hemp)?

where-cultivating-cannabis.legend: Where will you be cultivating the low THC cannabis?

is-company-own-fields.legend: Does your company own all the fields?

is-permission-for-activities.legend: Do you have permission from the owner to carry out your intended activities?

field-acreage.label: What is the total acreage of the fields?
field-acreage.hint: Enter a number and the unit of measure

how-many-fields.label: How many fields are you proposing to cultivate low THC cannabis in?

cultivation-field-details.label: Details of the fields you plan to cultivate low THC cannabis in

record-keeping-details.label: Provide details of your record keeping
record-keeping-details.hint: For example, seed type, date sown, crop failure
